dublin_core.dcvalue: One of the most important antimicrobial stewardship activities of the infectious diseases pharmacist and physician is to provide education and clinical information about antimicrobials to health care professionals and patients however clinician training and continuing education in appropriate antimicrobial use in the United States are highly variable and nonstandardized The iPhone iPad and the availability of more than 12 000 medical applications referred to as apps allow stewardship programs the ability to integrate novel technology with point of care education This article reviews medical apps for antimicrobial stewardship programs to use on the iPhone or iPad
iPhones, iPads, and medical applications for antimicrobial stewardship.
